commands.clear.description: clear all of your communication record with llm.
commands.video.description: using volcengine video model create video.
commands.chat.description: allows the bot to chat through /chat command in groups.
commands.task.description: multi agents communicate with each other, get the result.
commands.mcp.description: multi agents communicate with each other base on mcp server, get the result.
state_content:
🟣 Your Total Token Usage: %d

🟣 Your Today Token Usage: %d

🟣 Your This Week Token Usage: %d

🟣 Your This Month Token Usage: %d
token_exceed: ❌exceed token limit, used token: %d, available token: %d, total available token: %d
mode_change_fail: this mode just uses in local installed deepseek
help_text:
Available Commands:

/chat   - Allows the bot to chat in groups without admin privileges.

/mode   - Show current model type and model.

/state  - Calculate and view your current token usage.

/clear  - Clear all communication records to reset context.

/retry  - Retry your last question.

/txt\_type /photo\_type /video\_type /rec\_type - Choose the text/photo/video/recognition model type.

/txt\_model /photo\_model /video\_model /rec\_model - Choose the text/photo/video/recognition model.

/photo  - Create a photo using 

/edit\_photo - Edit the sent or last generated photo.

/video  - Generate a video 

/task   - Multi-agent collaboration to complete a task.

/mcp    - Use Multi-Agent Control Panel for complex task planning.

/cron\_list - Show the list of all scheduled cron jobs.

/cron\_del <id> - Delete a specific cron job by its ID.

/cron\_clear - Delete all scheduled cron jobs.

/change\_photo - (Tencent apps only) Change a photo based on your prompt.

/rec\_photo - (Tencent apps only) Recognize photo content based on your prompt.

/save\_voice - (Tencent apps only) Save your voice to PC.

/help   - Show this help message
photo_handle_prompt: Extract all the text from the image and return only the text.
set_pre_prompt_success: 🚀 Successfully set command, please upload photo/voice in 5 min.
mix_mode_choose: Please go to {{.link}} to choose a model. Use /$command xxx, for example /txt\_model gpt-5-chat-latest, to select a model.
audio_rec_prompt: get Content from this audio clip, only return the content
